sentence.text: The most significant association with childhood brain tumor risk was for IVS1-401GAAAAC in the somatic diversification of immunoglobulins gene [odds ratio (OR) = 2.8; 95% confidence interval (95%CI) = 1.25-6.46]; the polymorphism *9276AAAAAC of apoptotic process was associated with decreased brain tumor risk (OR = 0.4; 95%CI = 0.19-0.95).
We concluded that genetic polymorphisms in somatic diversification of immunoglobulins and apoptotic process are associated with risk for brain tumor in Korean children.
